attributes.action: Investigate why 200+ people are dying daily from COVID which equates to 73k pa.
attributes.additional_details: To prevent needless loss of life and negative effects on NHS who have to deal with majority of cases / deaths and whose limited resources are rapidly being overrun (again!)
attributes.background: Implement appropriate control measures to reduce infection levels to those seen in July 2020.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what specific control measures you'd like the Government to introduce or bring back. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
